title: Welcome to Gigamono
body:
We are excited to have you on the platform!

As an early adopter, we offer you a free 14-day trial with no obligations. We will have your feedback on the platform to help you get started, and we will continue to provide you with updates and support throughout the trial.

Please note that the trial will end on January 31, 2022.

If you have any questions, please contact us at
